<!-- rmarkdown::render('data_matrix_page.Rmd', output_file = 'C:/Users/15067/Desktop/eVITTA/easyGEO/server/data_matrix_page.html') -->
### 1) the data should be in comma- or tab-delimited format (csv, tsv, tab, txt),
<br/>
      
### 2) the first row of the matrix should be sample names; must match the sample names in the design matrix,
<br/>
      
### 3) the first column of the matrix should be gene names; no duplicates are allowed,
<br/>

### For example,
<br/>

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# tableOutput("dmdf_example")
knitr::kable(read.csv("C:/Users/15067/Desktop/eVITTA/easyGEO/server/data_matrix.tsv",header = TRUE, sep = "\t"))
```
